name: gia chemo cap
notes:
this cute chemo cap was designed with chemo patients in mind! 

finished hat will be approximately 19.5" unstretched, but will fit a head 20" to 22" which is an average adult head (if you are making it for someone who has a smaller head with no hair, cast on 88" or use a thinner yarn and a us6 needle)

you will need around 60-70g of worsted weight yarn, but i put down a 100g ball just to make sure you don't run out!

i made this chemo cap pattern free so that it can be made and shared with those in need. hopefully it will make a very rough time a little bit better!
